com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.eval

Class SearchServiceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.eval.AbstractServiceFactoryBase
      • com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.eval.SearchServiceFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceFactory

    public class SearchServiceFactory
extends AbstractServiceFactoryBase
    A factory for a search service. It accepts a group consisting of search magic predicates. See BD#SEARCH.
    Version:
    $Id$ TODO Add support for slicing the join using tools like CUTOFF (to limit the #of solutions) and specifying a RangeBOp (to impose the desired key range). CUTOFF and a single-threaded pipeline join can guarantee that we report out the top-N subjects in terms of the hit relevance. RangeBOp would work on a cluster. None of this is perfectly satisfactory.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
